name: bnnvc

stmt.origin: simp1bi(wcel(c0, cbn), wcel(c0, cnvc), wcel(c0, ccms), wcel(cfv(csca, c0), ccms))
stmt.pretty: simp1bi(c0 ∈ Ban, c0 ∈ NrmVec, c0 ∈ CMetSp, (Scalar ` c0)∈ CMetSp)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cbn), wcel(c0, cnvc))
-| wb(wcel(c0, cbn), w3a(wcel(c0, cnvc), wcel(c0, ccms), wcel(cfv(csca, c0), ccms)))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ Ban → c0 ∈ NrmVec)
⊣ (c0 ∈ Ban ↔(c0 ∈ NrmVec ∧ c0 ∈ CMetSp ∧(Scalar ` c0)∈ CMetSp))
